page.title: 10R.S.R.E. DEFFORD(2)
page.content:
connected with{satellite {communications}so that in a war messages can be transmitted more quickly and clearly without the use of cables. The work at{Defford}is still in it's infancy and when it gets more complicated the establishment will get larger and more people will be employed. In addition to the satellite communications equipment there are also two{radio telescopes,}one of these belongs to{Manchester University and is remotely controled from{Jodrel {Bank, Cheshire.
(L.Trueman,A.Chaplin,D.Clarke,P.Mann)
